name: accept attribute for file input
description: Allows a filter to be defined for what type of files a user may pick with from an `<input type="file">` dialog

notes.general:
Not supported means any file can be picked as if the `accept` attribute was not set, unless otherwise noted.

On Windows, files that do not apply are hidden. On OSX they are grayed out and disabled.

byNum.1: Supports the type format (e.g. `image/*`) but not the extension format (e.g. `.png`)
byNum.2: Offers appropriate file locations/input based on format type, but does not prevent other files from being selected.
byNum.3: Does not allow any files to be picked at all
byNum.4: Supports the type format but does not allow any file to be picked when using the extension format
